name: 25 Inch Sink Snake Drain Clog Remover Tool,6 Pack Drain Cleaner Hair Clog Remover Tool, Drain Hair Remover Plumbers Snake, Drain Cleaner Sticks, Easy and Quick Unclog Sink Drain, Kitchen, Shower, tub.
short_description: 【Package Contents】 This set comprises 6 plumbing snake tools, each measuring 25 inches, designed for eliminating pipe blockages. These versatile drain cleaner sticks feature a distinctive barbed hook design, enabling effortless removal of hair, food, and other particles. The drain auger serves as a valuable solution to maintain unobstructed plumbing systems.

【Easy Operation & Wide Application】The hair drain clog remover tool is used to simplify drain maintenance, with a process that is simple and safe - grasp the handle, insert the hair snake into the drain pipe, rotate, and then gently pull it out. Continue these steps until the drain pipe is completely clear. This drain hair clog remover Tool is suitable for various applications, including bathroom sinks, kitchen sinks, toilets, washbasins, bathtubs, and sewer systems.

【High Quality & Reusability】The unclog sink drain cleaner tool is meticulously crafted from durable and eco-friendly materials, ensuring an extended lifespan and preventing snapping or breaking, allowing for convenient reusability. Its enhanced polypropylene structure provides exceptional flexibility, enabling the barbed sink snake to effectively navigate through sink, bathtub, and shower P-traps, effortlessly clearing hair and debris blockages.

【Economic and Environmental Solution】 The Sink Snake Drain Clog Remover offers greater cost-effectiveness compared to professional plumbing services, while also being safer than chemical cleaners. The sink snake drain hair removal tool presents an environmentally friendly and budget-friendly option, providing an excellent value proposition for maintaining clear plumbing systems.

【Soft & Flexible drain Cleaning tool】Crafted using top-quality flexible materials, the drain hair remover tool boasts exceptional pliability, enabling effortless bending to conform to drain pipe curves; similarly, the sink clog remover tool's flexibility facilitates easy capture of hair and debris, resulting in highly efficient cleaning.

product_description: Product Feature: Breezz drain auger is a More Effective and Economical, Faster and Safer solution to snake your drain. NOTES: 1. Some sinks you may need to remove the drain hole cover or undo the p-trap if there is a drain strainer stopper that could not be detachable. 2. This drain auger is not specially designed to unclog a toilet blockage. Do not use it on the toilet, it may scratch the delicate porcelain of bowl. 3. The cable is not anchored to the auger drum and does not let it out all of the ways in case of falling it into the pipe or drain. If you have pulled it all out of the drum, just feed it back. 4. Don’t snake a drain if you’ve poured drain cleaners into the sink. The chemicals can cause serious burns if they splash on your skin. We recommend using our sink snake first when the water in your kitchen sink won’t drain or drains slowly. 5. Don't let the corkscrew tip face people's body when loosen the thumbscrew to prevent injury. 6. Need to pull the spring out or feed it back by hand. 7. For sticky and hard clog, please pour in liquid clog remover to loose the blockage before operate the drain auger which will help a better dredging. Specification: Color: Orange Cable Length:7.5m（25ft) Grip Handle & Drum Housing: ABS Cable Material: 72A Mn-Steel Package: 1 x Drain Auger 1 x Glove 1 x User Manual Not including electric drill 100% Satisfaction: If you have any issue about our drain auger, please feel free to contact us, we will do our best to help you.

name: EastLink 50 Inch Sink Snake Hair Drain Clog Remover, Anti-Break Steel Drain Snake Drain Hair Removal Tool, Flexible Shower Snake Drain Augers for Bathroom, Bathtub Drain Hair Catcher, 3 Pack
short_description: [50” Extra-Long, Slim Drain Snake] Our drain clog remover can reach deep into the drain to solve the blockage in most hard-to-reach places, and the 0.11-in ultra-slim wand is thin enough to fit into various narrow drain openings without getting stuck;

[Anti-Break Steel Snake] Embedded with 19 helical steel wires, our drain hair remover increases rigidity to withstand over 300lbs of pushing and pulling force without breaking and its nylon layer boosts flexibility for easy pipe trap navigation;

[Reinforced Micro Hooks] Our drain cleaner tool features stitched and glued micro-hooks for durability to avoid the tip falling off. Unlike plastic snakes with barbs that easily get stuck, our sink snake navigates pipes smoothly with a slim 0.22-in head;

[Easy to Use] Unclog drains in just three steps! Insert the plumber snake into the drain, spin it a few times, and then pull it out slowly. Warm tip: Bending the micro-hook slightly before insertion helps the snake drain navigate the trap more easily;

[Multi-Drain Clog Solver] Say goodbye to tiresome clogs! Our sink snake drain tool is flexible, making it not only suitable for showers, bathtubs, and sink drains, but also effective for specialized applications like fish tank drains and sunroof drain hole.
